title: Highest grossing Hollywood actors of all time in the U.S. 2019
yAxis: Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Samuel L. Jackson and lowest at Month Mark Ruffalo.
The difference of Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 3343.1.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars for 20 number of Months.
The maximum Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars 7107.8 is found at Month Samuel L. Jackson and the minimum is found at Mark Ruffalo where Month is 3764.7.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars for 20 number of Months.
The maximum Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars 7107.8 is found at Month Samuel L. Jackson and the minimum is found at Mark Ruffalo where Month is 3764.7.
Month Robert Downey Jr. has the second highest value for Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars.
The minimum Month Mark Ruffalo has got 1.89 times less Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars than the maximum Month Samuel L. Jackson.
Month Samuel L. Jackson is higher than any other Months with value 7107.8, followed by Robert Downey Jr., and Scarlett Johannsson. Down to Month Mark Ruffalo with the lowest value 3764.7.
Over the past 20 Months, the Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars has reduced.
The Month Mark Ruffalo has 1.58 times less Box office grosses in million U.S. dollars than average.
